sentences.english: Inner explosion-proof single-pole can be started up momentarily.
sentences.chinese: 内装防爆专用单极瞬时启动灯管，能快速瞬时启动。

sentences.english: All the cases were examined by EEG in the intermittent period.
sentences.chinese: 全部于间歇期描记单极及双极导联EEG。

sentences.english: The offtrack and crosstalk properties of perpendicular recording with a single pole head are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了垂直记录单极型磁头的偏道特性及串音特性。

sentences.english: A novel broad-band omnidirectional monopole antenna with dual-frequency is presented.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍了一种新型宽带双频全向单极天线。
单极控制器需要中心抽头绕组。

sentences.english: In this paper, the optimization of sleeve monopole antennas is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了套筒单极子天线的优化设计。

sentences.english: XMAC works with monopole full wave mode in cased hole.
sentences.chinese: XMAC在套管井中采用单极全波测量模式。

sentences.english: It is designed to provide unipolar differential drive to twisted pair or parallel wire transmission lines.
sentences.chinese: 它旨在为双绞线或并行线传输线路提供单极差分驱动。

sentences.english: A single-pole switch shall not be connected in the neutral grounded conductor.
sentences.chinese: 单极开关不能与地线的导电线联结。

sentences.english: This text expounded the electricity problems of central terminal and augmented unipolar limb lead.
sentences.chinese: 阐述中心电端和单极加压肢体导联中的电学问题。

sentences.english: Isolating switch for double column type structure, make unipolar form.
sentences.chinese: 隔离开关为双柱式结构，制成单极形式。

sentences.english: Three unipolar limb leads are conventionally employed in clinical electrocardiography.
sentences.chinese: 有三个单极的肢体导联习惯上用于临床心电图。

definition: the two poles/the north and south poles/both ends of sth/electric or magnetic poles
(elec.) unidirectional current/DC/also written 直流[zhi2 liu2]
trussed/with hands tied behind the back
